tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    interests TEXT[],
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
    ad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  interests TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  preference_value VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT unique_user_category UNIQUE (user_id, category)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
  activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
  click_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  ad_id INT NOT NULL,
  click_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_ad_id FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES ads(ad_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_1 VARCHAR(50),
    preference_2 VARCHAR(50),
    preference_3 VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
